# NAME

art_profile_builder-mpi -- Profile Builder for ART-Compatible Simulators with MPI Support

# SYNOPSIS

mpiexec -n 1 **art_profile_builder-mpi** [options]

# USAGE

See `mpiexec -n 1 art_profile_builder --help`.

# NOTE

The program currently only supports single process execution (`-n 1`).

# SEE ALSO

art_profiler_illumina(1)
